Formatter.description: Tools that reformat code to match style guidelines without changing logic.

Linter.description: Tools that check code for style violations, potential errors, and anti-patterns.

Analyzer.description: Tools that perform deeper analysis of code structure or logic without execution (distinct from basic linting).

TypeCheck.description: Tools that verify static type annotations.

Coverage.description: Tools that measure code coverage during test execution.

Complexity.description: Tools that measure code complexity metrics (e.g., cyclomatic complexity).

Deadcode.description: Tools that identify unused code (variables, functions, imports).

Security.description: Tools that scan code for potential security vulnerabilities.

Fuzzer.description: Tools that test code with generated, unexpected inputs to find bugs.

Docstrings.description: Tools that check documentation string style and completeness.

Secrets.description: Tools that specifically scan for inadvertently committed secrets.

Duplication.description: Tools that identify duplicated blocks of code.
